text:
The following also ran:—Strathern, Discord, Lancastrian, Marshal Scott, Westbourne, Ruperra, Zut, Blue Blood, Uncas, Visconti, Bute.

Betting at starting.—11 to 4 agst Discord—5 to 1 agst Rayon d'Or—7 to 1 agst Cadogan—8 to 1 agst Marshal Scott—9 to 1 agst Visconti—100 to 6 agst Ruperra—100 to 6 agst Blue Blood—100 to 6 agst Gunnersbury—20 to 1 agst Strathern—25 to 1 agst Charibert.

Immediately they began to rise the hill Charibert shot out with a clear lead of Cadogan and Rayon d'Or, and Lord Falmouth's colt, having the race in hand from the point named, won easily by a length and a half from Cadogan, who finished four lengths in advance of Rayon d'Or, who was third. Time, 1min. 51sec.

May Stakes.—Colorado, 3 yrs, 7st 9lb (1); Lyra c, 3 yrs, 6st 0lb (2); Gourmet, 3 yrs, 7st (3).

Prince of Wales' Stakes, for Four-yr-olds.—Inval, 8st 10lb (1); Lord Clive, 8st 10lb (2); Clementine, 8st 5lb (3). First Foal Stakes, for Three-yr-olds.—King Duncan, 8st 12lb (1); Ringleader, 8st 12lb (2).
